com.brightcove.player.network

Interface IDownloadManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DownloadManager

    public interface IDownloadManager
    Defines the contract of a download manager, which can used to queue and manage download requests.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IDownloadManager.IRequest
      Contract of a download request that can be submitted to the download manager.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • enqueueRequests

        @NonNull
java.util.List<java.lang.Long> enqueueRequests(long estimatedSize,
                                                        @NonNull
                                                        IDownloadManager.IRequest... requests)
        Enqueues one or more download requests. The download will start automatically once the download manager is ready to execute it and connectivity is available.
        Parameters:
        estimatedSize - the estimated total size of the download.
        requests - an array of requests to be enqueued.
        Returns:
        a list of identifiers to the enqueued requests.

      • enqueueRequestSet

        @NonNull
com.brightcove.player.store.DownloadRequestSet enqueueRequestSet(@Nullable
                                                                          RequestConfig requestConfig,
                                                                          long estimatedSize,
                                                                          @NonNull
                                                                          IDownloadManager.IRequest... requests)
        Enqueues a set of download requests.
        Parameters:
        requestConfig - the configuration to be used for handling the download requests.
        estimatedSize - the estimated total size of the download.
        requests - the download requests to be enqueued.
        Returns:
        reference to the queued download request set.

      • cancelRequests

        @NonNull
java.util.List<java.lang.Long> cancelRequests(long... requestIds)
        Cancels one or more download requests. Each download will be stopped if it was running. If there is a downloaded file, partial or complete, it will be deleted.
        Parameters:
        requestIds - an array of unique download request identifiers to be cancelled.
        Returns:
        a list of identifiers to the cancelled requests.

      • cancelRequestSet

        @NonNull
java.util.List<java.lang.Long> cancelRequestSet(@NonNull
                                                         com.brightcove.player.store.DownloadRequestSet requestSet)
        Cancels all the download requests in the specified set. Please note that calling this method simply causes the request set to be marked for deletion. The actual cancellation process will be handled in the background by the DownloadMonitorService. The DownloadMonitorService will stop queuing any pending requests in the set and remove all request that have been queued already. Finally the request set itself will be removed from the store.
        Parameters:
        requestSet -
        Returns:

      • getDownloadStatus

        @NonNull
DownloadStatus getDownloadStatus(long... requestIds)
        Checks the status of one or more download requests.
        Parameters:
        requestIds - an array of unique download request identifiers to be checked.
        Returns:
        the overall status of the download request(s).

      • getDownloadStatus

        @NonNull
DownloadStatus getDownloadStatus(@Nullable
                                          com.brightcove.player.store.DownloadRequestSet requestSet)
        Queries the overall download status of the specified download request set.
        Parameters:
        requestSet - reference to the download request set.
        Returns:
        the overall download status
